featured.text: Raised in California, Whitfield began performing in public at age 18, when she took a job as a singing waitress at a pizza parlor.

definition.zh_def: 女服務員，通常在餐廳或酒吧工作，負責為顧客提供餐飲服務。
definition.en_def: A female server who works in a restaurant or bar, responsible for serving food and drinks to customers.
definition.example: The waitress took our order and brought us our drinks.
